Pocket Files 3.0 is the biggest update ever with tons of new features and improvements:
- Complete redesign of the UI to make it even more easier to use
- Support for Messages. Now you can access and send your stored files from iMessage
- Show Touch ID automatically for the passcode
- 3D Touch support to preview files
- Ability to delete photos after import from Photo Library
- Improved website download speed
- Bug fixes and improvements
- And new icon!

If you like Pocket Files Pro and this update, please take a moment to leave a review in the app store, it really helps. If not, please send your feedback to support@rambax.com.
- Bug Fixes and various enhancements

Pocket Files Pro version 3.2 includes numerous improvements and bug fixes:
● Added Password recovery using email
● Saving photo back to Photos preserves the exif data and quality
● Fixed the location issue with Break-in photos
● Fixed a rare issue with launch passcode!
● Music and video are automatically played when opened
● Removed the status bar on top of videos that was obstructing the screen on playback

Note:
In this version we have removed the Folders passcode as this feature was mostly a redundant feature. Note that it can be easily replaced with the combination of launch passcode along with Decoy mode. You can also make the app more secure by increasing the length of launch passcode.

● Ability to set grid or list view for each folder
● Added Save button to the text editor in order to save the text file without leaving existing screen
● More bug fixes and improvements

Pocket Files 5.0 is a major update with tons of new features and improvements. We've been working hard for the last 8 months, incorporating many suggestions from our users as well as the experience we've gained within the past years.
We have redeveloped the entire file system from ground up, which will allow us to add many useful features in the future including encryption, cloud sync, multiple vaults and more.

◉ UI & General Improvements:
• Ability to mark files as favorite to view them quickly from the Favorites option
• Ability to set different icons and colors for each folder and files
• Ability to choose a frame for a video icon
• Auto folder cover or navigate into subfolders to select a folder picture
• Added settings to change font size for note files and to open URLs inside notes in the private web browser instead of Safari
• Larger thumbs: added a third viewing type
• Added a new option to sort items by Import Date
• Added a new dissolve transition in Slideshow
• Added duplicate option to quickly copy files within the same folder
• Ability to add Tags to each file or folder to be used in search
• Zip/Unzip files with password
• Added options to automatically close protected files/folders, notes, document viewer, photos and media player when the app closes
• Confirmation prompt before deleting items and emptying Trash
• Storage option in the App Settings now shows categorized space used in Primary and Decoy vaults, Trash and Break-in folders

◉ Media Player Improvements:
• New scrub, speed control, shuffle and video gravity controls for media player
• Resume media playback from where it's left off
• Added an option to disable swipe gestures
• Added a loop option in the App Settings for media player

◉ Photo Import Improvements:
• Shows larger albums much faster now
• Improve photo selection in Photos import with better progress animation
• Preserve photo metadata after edit
• Added GPS metada to captured photo

◉ Private Browser Improvements:
• Added Bookmarks folder where you can create bookmark files to browse the Internet quickly (this saves 4 taps!)
• Added an option to download files to Downloads, launched, custom folders or just ask user when downloading each file
• Private Browser is now available in decoy vault with its own history and bookmarks

◉ And so many other minor improvements and bug fixes...

Please do let us know your feedbacks and suggestions by leaving a review or sending email from inside the app.

Pocket Files v5.1 brings many new features and improvements:
◉ Multiple vaults: you can now add multiple vaults in addition to the primary and decoy vaults
◉ Brand new App Icon and also an option to let you choose over dozen alternate app icons including all classic Pocket Files icons
◉ Smaller thumbs: added a fourth viewing type

◉ Added an option to change the view type (list, grid etc) of a folder and all of its sub-folders globally instead of changing them one by one

◉ Added an option to disable auto folder cover
◉ Added an option to disable transition in slideshow
◉ Added an option to change the Notes background color manually to Light or Dark in the App Settings
◉ A new loop control on the media player to loop a single video or all videos or turn it off
◉ Added options to disable delete confirmations
◉ Panic Action can now be switched to any vault
◉ Added keyboard shortcut "F" to toggle favorite in slideshow
◉ Fixed Share and Email options not showing up in the file settings on iPad
◉ And many other improvements and bug fixes
